column5: I was wondering if anyone has had any luck fishing Shades Milles Conservation Area in Cambridge? If so, would you mind sharing any advice, tips, or general information regarding your catches or lack there of lol. Feel free to post a reply or PM me. Thanks in advance.

Fished it in the summer and caught a 3-5 lbs large mouth on a spinner...was fishing with my son and he caught a couple just under that.  When we were there, there were not many people fishing...only a couple of other kids.  From what I've heard, there may be some trout in there too...or at least the small rivers/creeks that feed into it at least.
